dcterms:creator: Andreas Geiger
Philip Lenz
Raquel Urtasun
dcterms:description: The KITTI dataset contains a large number of point cloud data collected by a Velodyne 64-beam LiDAR under low viewpoint variation. It is used for evaluating place recognition methods.
dcterms:title: KITTI dataset

dcterms:creator: Yin Peng
Zhao Shiqi
Ge Ruohai
Cisneros Ivan
Fu Ruijie
Zhang Ji
Choset Howie
A. Scherer Sebastian
dcterms:description: The ALITA dataset is designed for long-term place recognition in large-scale environments, containing point cloud data of campus and city scenes under different illuminations and viewpoints.
dcterms:title: ALITA dataset

dcterms:creator: Mikaela Angelina Uy
Gim Hee Lee
dcterms:description: The benchmark dataset is broadly used by recent place recognition methods based on unordered points, consisting of various scenarios including outdoor and in-house datasets.
dcterms:title: benchmark dataset
